column4: hi all. how do i do a check disk and repair on my ntfs harddrive? i'm getting input/output error when i try to save things to it, and it's files are not showing up in os x
ntfs checks should be done in Windows.
The ntfs tools in Linux are good for reading and if you are daring, a little writing.  They are not up to extensive ntfs work.  Microsoft keeps the details of NTFS secret.
